name: client_id
comment: Client ID. Your client id can be obtained by creating an app at https://builder.quantimo.do (type: string)

name: client_secret
comment: Client Secret. Get yours at https:://builder.quantimo.do (type: string)

name: redirect_uri
comment: Redirect Uri.

name: grant_types
comment: Grant Types.

name: user_id
comment: Numeric User ID

name: created_at
comment: Time at which the Oauth Client was Created At. When the record was first created. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: updated_at
comment: Time at which the Oauth Client was Updated At. When the record was last updated. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: icon_url
comment: Icon Url.

name: app_identifier
comment: App IDentifier.

name: deleted_at
comment: Time at which the Oauth Client was Deleted At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: earliest_measurement_start_at
comment: Time at which the Oauth Client was Earliest Measurement Start At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: latest_measurement_start_at
comment: Time at which the Oauth Client was Latest Measurement Start At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: number_of_global_variable_relationships
comment:
Number of Global Variable Relationships. Number of Global Population Studies for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from global_variable_relationships
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_global_variable_relationships = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_applications
comment:
Number of Applications. Number of Applications for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from applications
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_applications = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_oauth_access_tokens
comment:
Number of Oauth Access Tokens. Number of OAuth Access Tokens for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(access_token) as total, client_id
                            from oa_access_tokens
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_oauth_access_tokens = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_oauth_authorization_codes
comment:
Number of Oauth Authorization Codes. Number of OAuth Authorization Codes for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(authorization_code) as total, client_id
                            from oa_authorization_codes
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_oauth_authorization_codes = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_oauth_refresh_tokens
comment:
Number of Oauth Refresh Tokens. Number of OAuth Refresh Tokens for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(refresh_token) as total, client_id
                            from oa_refresh_tokens
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_oauth_refresh_tokens = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_button_clicks
comment:
Number of Button Clicks. Number of Button Clicks for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from button_clicks
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_button_clicks = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_collaborators
comment:
Number of Collaborators. Number of Collaborators for this Client.
                [Formula:

                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from collaborators

                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_collaborators = count(grouped.total)
                ]

name: number_of_common_tags
comment:
Number of Common Tags. Number of Common Tags for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id

                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_common_tags = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_connections
comment:
Number of Connections. Number of Connections for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from connections
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_connections = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                .

name: number_of_connector_imports
comment:
Number of Connector Imports. Number of Connector Imports for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from connector_imports

                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_connector_imports = count(grouped.total)

name: number_of_connectors
comment:
Number of Connectors. Number of Connectors for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from connectors
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_connectors = count(grouped.total)

name: number_of_correlations
comment:
Number of Correlations. Number of Individual Case Studies for this Client.
                [Formula: 
                    update oa_clients
                        left join (
                            select count(id) as total, client_id
                            from correlations
                            group by client_id
                        )
                        as grouped on oa_clients.client_id = grouped.client_id
                    set oa_clients.number_of_correlations = count(grouped.total)
                ]
                . Number of correlations for this variable (type: integer)
